General.Title: Subtitle Edit
General.OnlineVideoFeatureNotAvailable: Feature not available for online video

About.Title: About Subtitle Edit
About.AboutText1:
Subtitle Edit is Free Software under the GNU Public License. You may distribute, modify and use it freely.
C# source code is available on https://github.com/SubtitleEdit/subtitleedit
Visit https://www.nikse.dk for the latest version.
Suggestions are very welcome.
Email: mailto:nikse.dk@gmail.com

BeautifyTimeCodes.Title: Beautify time codes
BeautifyTimeCodes.AlignTimeCodes: Align time codes to frame time codes
BeautifyTimeCodes.ExtractExactTimeCodes: Use FFprobe to extract exact frame time codes
BeautifyTimeCodes.NoTimeCodesLoadedError:
You've selected to extract exact frame time codes, but there are no time codes loaded.
Please click "{0}" to extract the time codes first, or disable this option.
BeautifyTimeCodes.NoShotChangesLoadedError:
You've selected to snap cues to shot changes, but there are no shot changes loaded.
Please click "{0}" to generate or import shot changes first, or disable this option.
BeautifyTimeCodes.BatchAlignTimeCodes: Align time codes to frame time codes
BeautifyTimeCodes.BatchSnapToShotChanges: Snap cues to shot changes (if available)
BeautifyTimeCodes.UnfixableParagraphsInstructions:
Some subtitles were not fully chained in accordance with your profile, most likely due to too tightly clustered shot changes (possibly false positives).
You might want to review these cases manually to ensure your cues are snapped to the correct (real) shot changes.

BeautifyTimeCodesProfile.Title: Edit profile
BeautifyTimeCodesProfile.TreadAsConnected: Treat as connected if gap is smaller than:
BeautifyTimeCodesProfile.CheckGeneral: Still enforce General rules when unaffected
BeautifyTimeCodesProfile.ShotChangeBehavior: If there is a shot change in between:
BeautifyTimeCodesProfile.ResetWarning:
This will reset your current profile and replace all values with those of the selected preset. This cannot be undone.
Do you want to continue?
BeautifyTimeCodesProfile.CreateSimpleInstruction: Enter these basic rules, and the current profile will be updated accordingly.
BeautifyTimeCodesProfile.CreateSimpleGapInstruction: The minimum amount of space between subtitles.
BeautifyTimeCodesProfile.CreateSimpleOutCuesGap: Minimum gap before the shot change
BeautifyTimeCodesProfile.CreateSimpleSnapClosestCue: For connected subtitles, snap the in or out cue to a shot change based on which one is closer
BeautifyTimeCodesProfile.CreateSimpleMaxOffsetInstruction: Cues within this distance from shot changes will be snapped to the shot change.
BeautifyTimeCodesProfile.CreateSimpleSafeZoneInstruction: Cues within this distance from shot changes will be moved away from the shot change.
BeautifyTimeCodesProfile.CreateSimpleChainingGapInstruction: If the space between two subtitles is smaller than this amount, the subtitles will be connected.
BeautifyTimeCodesProfile.CreateSimpleChainingGapAfterShotChanges: After an out cue on a shot change, the gap may be smaller
BeautifyTimeCodesProfile.CreateSimpleChainingToolTip:
Chaining subtitles is recommended to ensure a consistent "rhythm" in the "flashing" of the subtitles. This offers a more relaxed viewing experience.
After chaining, subtitles are either connected (i.e. a subtitle disappears and a new subtitle appears immediately after a slight pause) or not. This gives the viewer some sense on when they can shift their focus back to the screen.
The length of the chaining gap can be a bit smaller right after a subtitle disappears on a shot change, because the changing shot "resets" the image in a way. We leverage the intrinsic rhythm of the image.
BeautifyTimeCodesProfile.OffsetSafeZoneError: The safe zone should be larger than the max. offset.

BinEdit.CenterSelectedLines: Center selected lines (horizontally, keep vertical position)
BinEdit.TopAlignSelectedLines: Top align selected lines (keep horizontal position)
BinEdit.BottomAlignSelectedLines: Bottom align selected lines (keep horizontal position)

FixCommonErrors.Title: Fix common errors
FixCommonErrors.Step1: Step 1/2 - Choose which errors to fix
FixCommonErrors.RemoveLineBreaks: Remove line breaks in short texts with only one sentence
FixCommonErrors.RemoveLineBreaksAll: Remove line breaks in short texts (all except dialogs)
FixCommonErrors.RemoveLineBreaksPixelWidth: Unbreak subtitles that can fit on one line (pixel width)
FixCommonErrors.FixUppercaseIInsideLowercaseWords: Fix uppercase 'i' inside lowercase words (OCR error)
FixCommonErrors.FixDoubleApostrophes: Fix double apostrophe characters ('') to a single quote (")
FixCommonErrors.AddPeriods: Add period after lines where next line starts with uppercase letter
FixCommonErrors.StartWithUppercaseLetterAfterParagraph: Start with uppercase letter after paragraph
FixCommonErrors.StartWithUppercaseLetterAfterPeriodInsid: Start with uppercase letter after period inside paragraph
FixCommonErrors.StartWithUppercaseLetterAfterColon: Start with uppercase letter after colon/semicolon
FixCommonErrors.FixCommonOcrErrors: Fix common OCR errors (using OCR replace list)
FixCommonErrors.CommonOcrErrorsFixed: Common OCR errors fixed (OcrReplaceList file used): {0}
FixCommonErrors.RemoveDialogFirstInNonDialogs: Remove start dash in first line for non-dialogs
FixCommonErrors.FixTurkishAnsi: Fix Turkish ANSI (Icelandic) letters to Unicode
FixCommonErrors.FixSpanishInvertedQuestionAndExclamation: Fix Spanish inverted question and exclamation marks
FixCommonErrors.RemoveHyphensSingleLine: Remove dialog dashes in single lines
FixCommonErrors.FixHyphensInDialogs: Fix dash in dialogs via style: {0}
FixCommonErrors.Fix3PlusLine: Fix subtitle with more than two lines
FixCommonErrors.Fix3PlusLines: Fix subtitles with more than two lines
FixCommonErrors.NothingFixableBut: Nothing could be fixed automatically. The subtitle contains errors - see log for details
FixCommonErrors.XFixedBut: {0} issue(s) fixed but the subtitle still contains errors - see log for details
FixCommonErrors.XCouldBeFixedBut: {0} issue(s) could be fixed but the subtitle will still contain errors - see log for details
FixCommonErrors.FixFirstLetterToUppercaseAfterParagraph: Fix first letter to uppercase after paragraph
FixCommonErrors.FixInvalidItalicTagsExample: What do I care. -> What do I care.
FixCommonErrors.RemoveUnneededSpacesExample: Hey you , there. -> Hey you, there.
FixCommonErrors.FixUppercaseIInsideLowercaseWordsExample: The earth is fIat. -> The earth is flat.
FixCommonErrors.FixLowercaseIToUppercaseIExample: What do i care. -> What do I care.
FixCommonErrors.StartTimeLaterThanEndTime: Text number {0}: Start time is later than end time: {4}{1} -> {2} {3}
FixCommonErrors.UnableToFixStartTimeLaterThanEndTime: Unable to fix text number {0}: Start time is later than end time: {1}
FixCommonErrors.FixMissingPeriodAtEndOfLine: Add missing period at end of line
FixCommonErrors.FixMusicNotation: Replace music symbols (e.g. âTª) with preferred symbol
FixCommonErrors.FixMusicNotationExample: 'âTª sweet dreams are' -> '♫ sweet dreams are'
FixCommonErrors.FixDialogsOneLineExample:
Hi John! - Hi Ida! -> Hi John!
- Hi Ida!
FixCommonErrors.RemoveDialogFirstInNonDialogsExample: - How are you? -> How are you?

Main.ErrorLoad7Zip: This file seems to be a compressed 7-Zip file. Subtitle Edit cannot open compressed files.
Main.ErrorLoadPng: This file seems to be a PNG image file. Subtitle Edit cannot open PNG files.
Main.ErrorLoadJpg: This file seems to be a JPG image file. Subtitle Edit cannot open JPG files.
Main.ErrorLoadSrr: This file seems to be a ReScene .srr file - not a subtitle file.
Main.ErrorLoadTorrent: This file seems to be a BitTorrent file - not a subtitle file.

Sorry, this file contains only binary zeroes!
If you have edited this file with Subtitle Edit you might be able to find a backup via the menu item File -> Restore auto-backup...

Settings.Title: Settings
Settings.OpenDataFolder: Open the Subtitle Edit data folder
Settings.MinimumGapMilliseconds: Min. gap between subtitles in ms
Settings.VideoAutoOpen: Auto-open video file when opening subtitle
Settings.RememberPositionAndSize: Remember main window position and size
Settings.RemoveBlankLinesWhenOpening: Remove blank lines when opening a subtitle
Settings.ApplyAssaOverrideTags: Apply ASSA override tags to selection
Settings.ShowLineBreaksAs: Show line breaks in list view as
Settings.MainListViewDoubleClickAction: Double-clicking line in main window list view will
Settings.MainListViewVideoGoToPositionAndPause: Go to video position and pause
Settings.MainListViewVideoGoToPositionAndPlay: Go to video position and play
Settings.MainListViewVideoGoToPositionAndPlayCurr: Go to video position, play current, and pause
Settings.MainListViewVideoGoToPositionMinus1SecAn: Go to video position - 1 s and pause
Settings.MainListViewVideoGoToPositionMinusHalfSe: Go to video position - 0.5 s and pause
Settings.MainListViewVideoGoToPositionMinus1SecAn: Go to video position - 1 s and play
Settings.MainListViewEditTextAndPause: Go to edit text box, and pause at video position
Settings.SplitBehaviorPrevious: Add gap to the left of split point (focus right)
Settings.SplitBehaviorHalf: Add gap in the center of split point (focus left)
Settings.SplitBehaviorNext: Add gap to the right of split point (focus left)
Settings.MpvPlayerDescription: https://mpv.io/ - free, open source, and cross-platform media player
Settings.VlcMediaPlayerDescription: libvlc.dll from VLC media player 1.1.0 or newer
Settings.VlcBrowseToLabel: VLC path (only needed if you're using the portable version of VLC)
Settings.WaveformSetVideoPosMoveStartEnd: Set video position when moving start/end
Settings.WaveformListViewFocusMouseEnter: Also set list view focus on mouse enter in list view
Settings.WaveformSnapToShotChanges: Snap to shot changes (hold Shift to override)
Settings.WaveformAutoGen: Auto generate waveform when opening video
Settings.WaveformBorderHitMs1: Border marker hit must be within
Settings.NetworkSessionNewSound: Play sound file when new message arrives
Settings.PlayXSecondsAndBack: Play X seconds and back, X is
Settings.CpsLineLengthStyleCalcNoSpaceCpsOnly: Count all except space, cps only
Settings.CpsLineLengthStyleCalcNoSpaceOrPunctuati: No space or punctuation, cps only
Settings.MusicSymbolsReplace: Music symbols to replace (separate by comma)
Settings.FixCommonOcrErrorsUseHardcodedRules: Fix common OCR errors - also use hard-coded rules
Settings.FixCommonerrorsFixShortDisplayTimesAllow: Fix short display time - allow move of start time
Settings.FavoriteSubtitleFormatsNote: Note: favorite formats will be shown first when selecting a format, the default format will always be shown first
Settings.CreateSetEndAddNewAndGoToNew: Set end, add new and go to new
Settings.AdjustViaEndAutoStartAndGoToNext: Adjust via end position and go to next
Settings.AdjustSetEndMinusGapAndStartNextHere: Set end minus gap, go to next and start next here
Settings.AdjustSetEndAndStartNextAfterGap: Set end and start of next after gap
Settings.AdjustSetStartTimeAndGoToNext: Set start and go to next
Settings.AdjustSetEndTimeAndGoToNext: Set end and go to next
Settings.AdjustSetStartAutoDurationAndGoToNext: Set start, auto duration and go to next
Settings.AdjustSetEndNextStartAndGoToNext: Set end, next start and go to next
Settings.AdjustStartDownEndUpAndGoToNext: Key down=set start, Key up=set end and go to next
Settings.AdjustSetStartAndEndOfPrevious: Set start and set end of previous (minus min gap)
Settings.AdjustSetStartAndEndOfPreviousAndGoToNex: Set start and set end of previous and go to next (minus min gap)
Settings.AdjustStartOneFrameBackKeepGapPrev: Move start 1 frame back (keep gap to previous if close)
Settings.AdjustStartOneFrameForwardKeepGapPrev: Move start 1 frame forward (keep gap to previous if close)
Settings.AdjustEndOneFrameBackKeepGapNext: Move end 1 frame back (keep gap to next if close)
Settings.AdjustEndOneFrameForwardKeepGapNext: Move end 1 frame forward (keep gap to next if close)
Settings.AdjustSetStartAndOffsetTheWholeSubtitle: Set start time, offset the whole subtitle
Settings.AdjustSetEndAndOffsetTheRestAndGoToNext: Set end, offset the rest and go to next
Settings.AdjustSnapStartToNextShotChange: Snap selected lines start to next shot change
Settings.AdjustSnapEndToPreviousShotChange: Snap selected lines end to previous shot change
Settings.AdjustExtendToNextShotChange: Extend selected lines to next shot change (or next subtitle)
Settings.AdjustExtendToPreviousShotChange: Extend selected lines to previous shot change (or previous subtitle)
Settings.AdjustExtendToNextSubtitle: Extend selected lines to next subtitle
Settings.AdjustExtendToPreviousSubtitle: Extend selected lines to previous subtitle
Settings.AdjustExtendToNextSubtitleMinusChainingG: Extend selected lines to next subtitle with chaining gap
Settings.AdjustExtendToPreviousSubtitleMinusChain: Extend selected lines to previous subtitle with chaining gap
Settings.AdjustExtendCurrentSubtitle: Extend current line to next subtitle or max duration
Settings.AdjustExtendPreviousLineEndToCurrentStar: Extend previous line's end to current's start
Settings.AdjustExtendNextLineStartToCurrentEnd: Extend next line's start to current's end
Settings.RecalculateDurationOfCurrentSubtitleByOp: Re-calculate duration of current subtitle (based on optimal reading speed)
Settings.RecalculateDurationOfCurrentSubtitleByMi: Re-calculate duration of current subtitle (based on minimum reading speed)
Settings.SetInCueToClosestShotChangeLeftGreenZone: Set in cue to minimum distance before closest shot change (left green zone)
Settings.SetInCueToClosestShotChangeRightGreenZon: Set in cue to minimum distance after closest shot change (right green zone)
Settings.SetOutCueToClosestShotChangeLeftGreenZon: Set out cue to minimum distance before closest shot change (left green zone)
Settings.SetOutCueToClosestShotChangeRightGreenZo: Set out cue to minimum distance after closest shot change (right green zone)
Settings.MainCreateStartDownEndUp: Insert new subtitle at key-down, set end time at key-up
Settings.GoToNextPlayTranslate: Go to next line (and play in 'Translate mode')
Settings.GoToNextCursorAtEnd: Go to next line and set cursor at end
Settings.GoToPreviousPlayTranslate: Go to previous line (and play in 'Translate mode')
Settings.GoToPreviousSubtitleAndFocusVideo: Go to previous line and set video position
Settings.GoToNextSubtitleAndFocusVideo: Go to next line and set video position
Settings.GoToPrevSubtitleAndPlay: Go to previous line and play
Settings.GoToNextSubtitleAndPlay: Go to next line and play
Settings.GoToPreviousSubtitleAndFocusWaveform: Go to previous line and focus waveform
Settings.GoToNextSubtitleAndFocusWaveform: Go to next line and focus waveform
Settings.ToggleFocus: Toggle focus between list view and subtitle text box
Settings.ToggleFocusWaveform: Toggle focus between list view and waveform/spectrogram
Settings.ToggleFocusWaveformTextBox: Toggle focus between text box and waveform/spectrogram
Settings.CopyTextOnly: Copy text only to clipboard (selected lines)
Settings.CopyPlainText: Copy plain text to clipboard (selected lines)
Settings.CopyTextOnlyFromOriginalToCurrent: Copy text from original to current
Settings.FixRTLViaUnicodeChars: Fix RTL via Unicode control characters
Settings.WaveformAddTextHereFromClipboard: Add text here (for new selection from clipboard)
Settings.WaveformAllShotChangesOneFrameForward: Move all shot changes one frame forward
Settings.WaveformAllShotChangesOneFrameBack: Move all shot changes one frame back
Settings.WaveformGuessStart: Auto adjust start via volume/shot change
Settings.GoToStartCurrent: Set video pos to start of current subtitle
Settings.ToggleStartEndCurrent: Toggle video pos between start/end of current subtitle
Settings.WaveformGoToPrevSubtitle: Go to previous subtitle (from video position)
Settings.WaveformGoToNextSubtitle: Go to next subtitle (from video position)
Settings.WaveformGoToPrevTimeCode: Go to previous time code (from video position)
Settings.WaveformGoToNextTimeCode: Go to next time code (from video position)
Settings.WaveformSelectNextSubtitle: Select next subtitle (from video position, keep video pos)
Settings.VideoResetSpeedAndZoom: Reset play rate (speed) and waveform zoom
Settings.SyntaxColorTextMoreThanMaxLines: Color text if more than {0} lines
Settings.MergeSelectedLinesAndUnbreakCjk: Merge selected lines and unbreak without space (CJK)
Settings.MergeSelectedLinesOnlyFirstText: Merge selected lines, keep only first non-empty text
Settings.SwitchOriginalAndTranslationTextBoxes: Switch original and translation text boxes/list view columns
Settings.ToggleTranslationAndOriginalInPreviews: Toggle translation and original in video/audio preview
Settings.ListViewColumnDeleteAndShiftUp: Column, delete text and shift up
Settings.MainTextBoxMoveLastWordDown: Move last word to next subtitle
Settings.MainTextBoxMoveFirstWordFromNextUp: Fetch first word from next subtitle
Settings.MainTextBoxMoveFirstWordUpCurrent: Move first word from next line up (current subtitle)
Settings.MainTextBoxMoveFromCursorToNext: Move text after cursor position to next subtitle and go to next
Settings.MainTextBoxMoveLastWordDownCurrent: Move last word from first line down (current subtitle)
Settings.MainTextBoxAutoBreakFromPos: Break at first space from cursor position
Settings.MainTextBoxAutoBreakFromPosAndGoToNext: Break at first space from cursor position and go to next
Settings.MainTextBoxDictate: Dictate (key down=start recording, key up=end recording)
Settings.BreakEarlyForLineEnding: Break early for end of sentence (.!?)
Settings.FontNote: Note: These font settings are for the Subtitle Edit UI only. Setting a font for a subtitle is normally done in the video player, but can also be done when using a subtitle format with built-in font information like "Advanced Sub Station Alpha" or via export to image-based formats.
Settings.RestoreDefaultSettingsMsg:
All settings will be restored to default values
Continue?
Settings.EditFixContinuationStyleSettings: Edit settings for fixing continuation style...
Settings.UncheckInsertsAllCaps: Detect and uncheck single titles in all-caps (for example: NO ENTRY)
Settings.UncheckInsertsItalic: Detect and uncheck italic single titles, or lyrics
Settings.UncheckInsertsLowercase: Detect and uncheck single titles, or lyrics, in lowercase
Settings.XFramesAtYFrameRateGivesZMs: {0} frames at a frame rate of {1} gives {2} milliseconds.
Settings.UseXAsNewGap: Use "{0}" milliseconds as new minimum gap?
Settings.ShortcutsAllowSingleLetterOrNumberInText: Shortcuts: Allow single letter/number in text box
Settings.DifferentStyleGap: Use different style for gaps longer than
Settings.CustomContinuationStyleNote: Note: The custom continuation style is shared across profiles.
Settings.ResetCustomContinuationStyleWarning: This will override the values in the dialog. Are you sure?

SetVideoOffset.KeepTimeCodes: Keep existing time codes (do not add video offset)

SpellCheck.AutoFixNames: Auto fix names where only casing differs
SpellCheck.AutoFixNamesViaSuggestions: Also fix names via 'spell check suggestions'
SpellCheck.CheckOneLetterWords: Prompt for unknown one letter words
SpellCheck.TreatINQuoteAsING: Treat word ending " in' " as " ing " (English only)

SpellCheck.NoDictionaryForLiveSpellCheck: Live spell check - You don't have dictionaries for this language [{0}]

SplitLongLines.LongestLineIsXAtY: Longest total line length is {0} at line {1}

SubStationAlphaProperties.WrapStyle3: 3: Smart wrapping, bottom line is wider

PointSync.SyncHelp: Set at least two sync points to make rough synchronization
